dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Morning, old friend. Anything unusual in the heart of the woods today?

dialogues.speaker: Fellow Hunter
dialogues.message: Leon! Good to see you up. There's been some suspicious activity near the southern edge. The Elder is worried.

dialogues.speaker: Fellow Hunter
dialogues.message: Yeah, but the village has been on edge. They're counting on your roasted boar for the feast to lighten the mood.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: I'll make sure to get one during today's hunt. Keep an eye on the village for me, will you?
